title: July's Recipes
description: Built a scalable MERN web app to showcase my mom's recipes, implementing internationalization with i18next for multilingual support.

title: The Skincare Place
description: Developed a React and Rails-based skincare guide with a unique user interface built through Material UI, and utilized react-router-dom's useParams to dynamically respond to user selection.

title: Pic-It-Up: In Queens
description: Created a location-based game that encourages users to explore Queens, NY. Used Piexifjs for geotag validation, featuring a RESTful API with seeded data.
